info.description: This API will send valid devices, rate plans, services and accessories for a given sales scenario in a channel.
info.title: Create Package

post.summary: This Generic API shall be used by client to submit request to create package

marketCode.description: Market code of the billing account

salesScenario.description: scenario on which user wants to work on like ShopForPhones, ShopForVoicePlans etc

userId.description: UserID of the rep who is initiating this transaction

orderCategory.description: Order category 0001 - salesorder, 0003 - return, 0005 - purchaseOrder (if the order is placed to an external vendor)t

orderType.description: type of the order.(exchange, standard only for0001 documentType)

country.description: refers to the country, default is US.

currencyCode.description: refers to the currency, default is USD

language.description: refers to the language, default is English

originalOrderId.description: refers to the original order id, required for exchange sales scenario.

returnOrderId.description: refers to the return order id, required for exchange sales scenario

orderId.description: refers to the unique order number generated for each order

orderLineId.description: refers to the unique id generated for each bundle for an order

stateCode.description: Billing statecode for Web, Care and Retail Ship-To cases and Store statecode for Retail In-store

calculatePromotions.description: indicates if promotions needs to be calculated for this request

eligibleCSDLines.description: Number of CSD lines passed in the request

viewOptions.description: decides the service output behaviour. refers to 'List' for product basic information and 'Details' for detailed information like product image etc

includeFilter.description: If true then the response would include the applicable subCategory/attribute filters for the chosen category, but it does not return the count per each filter/ facets

eipEligibleDealer.description: set to true if the rep is eligible for doing EIP Upgrade, UI is responsible for validating the permission of the dealer by calling OER

allowedSubsidyTypeList.description: List of allowed Device Activation Types for the dealer

optOutReason.description: Reason for opting out from the TradeIn,which will be used by OMNI to call LogOptReasonservice.UI has to send any valid reference data which they get from the service getOptOutReasons

includeWarrantyDetails.description: Flag to indicate whether warranty details (eg. apple care plus program) to be populated in the response

includeServiceDetails.description: Flag to indicate whether Optional Services Details (for example eligible PHP SOCs) should be sent back in the in the response, if there is no value it is assumed to be false.

delinquencyOverride.description: override/disable EIP for Bulk order if delinquency status is passed as true

senderId.description: Uniquely identifies an Operation consumer. Used for Tracking and in Business Rules.

channelId.description: Identifies the business unit or sales channel for the Request. Property values relating to the target system are derived using partner, application, and channel information. This value may control business logic and data routing

applicationId.description: Identifies the application, system, or tool that is being used to perform the transaction(s) related to this request. Property values relating to the target system are derived using partner, application, and channel information

sessionId.description: A value populated by the Sender used to track the transactions that occur during a session, a long-lasting interaction that is maintained by the sender. Senders are encouraged to develop a useful scheme. Do not use customer-sensitive information

workflowId.description: A value populated by the Sender used to track their workflow within the confines of a session. Senders are encouraged to develop a useful scheme. Do not use customer-sensitive informatio

activityId.description: A value populated by the Sender used to track a unit of work within a workflow. Senders are encouraged to develop a useful scheme. Do not use customer-sensitive information

timestamp.description: A timestamp provided by Sender to track their workflow. Usually set to the moment when a request is made.

storeId.description: For tracking purposes only. Unique identifier for the store

dealerCode.description: For tracking purposes only. Code that uniquely identifies the dealer.

accessChannel.description: Represents the channel (access) type of the dealer who process this requestÂ  for e.g. AtWorks

creditClassification.description: The calculated credit classification of the customer

creditClassificationRequestDate.description: date at which request was submitted for credit class verification.

serviceStartDate.description: The service start date of an account

futureBillFormat.description: Furture bill format of the account

currentBillFormat.description: Current bill format of the account

availableVoiceLines.description: the number of available voice lines for a customer

availableDataLines.description: the number of available data lines for a customer.

totalMigrationFee.description: total migration fee associated with the transaction. For Pooled accounts total of all the lines and for non-pooled it total of the lines part of the upgrade will be returned

prepaidSubscriberID.description: the number of available pre paid subscriber’s for a custome

taxExemptIndicator.description: Indicates if the customer is tax exempted or not

identifier.description: A unique value that represents the credit risk profile of a Customer based on various credentials of his account. This may be a number such as '1', '2'.

behaviorScore.description: A value that is dynamically assigned to a Customer based on his various account activities. For new Customers this may not be returned.

decisionCriteria.description: This element specifies what has been used to assign the credit risk profile ID. A valid value is 'CREDIT_CLASS_BASED'.

creditApplicationReferenceNumber.description: A unique reference number that can locate the Customer’s credit application. On rare conditions when the System does not have this information, it will be defaulted to '0'.

loanCRP.description: A unique value that represents the credit risk profile of a Customer based on various credentials of his account for Loan. This may be a number such as '1', '2'.

leaseCRP.description: A unique value that represents the credit risk profile of a Customer based on various credentials of his account for Lease. This may be a number such as '1','2'.

actualInstallmentPaid.description: Indicates the actual payment done towards EIP which may include an additional amount on top of the down payment

adjustedDownPayment.description: The down payment when the Financed amount is more than the available ECA - calculated by Configurator

finalDownPayment.description: The balance between downpayment/adjustedDownPayment and jumpTradeInCredit - calculated by Configurator

jumpCreditEIPPayOff.description: jumpCredit applied to PayOff device credit balance

jumpCreditDownPayment.description: jumpCredit applied to subscriber's down payment

jumpBillCredit.description: jumpBillCredit applied to the subscriber installment account

term.description: number of eipterms of the installment account

adjustedTerm.description: Adjusted total No of EIP Months, term-1

transactionType.description: Identifies the type of EIP transaction.Below are the possible values. U - JUMP/Regualar Upgrade A - ResumeActivation L- ResumeAAL P - JUMP/Regular Exchange

IMSI.description: IMSI that is currently associated with this sim device

SIM.description: Sim device number that is associated with this record

faveCapable.description: Boolean flag indicating the status(Fave capable or not

umaCapable.description: Boolean flag indicating the status(UMA capable or not)

nfcCapable.description: Boolean flag indicating the NFC capability of the device

claimType.description: The type of loss being claimed • Physical Damage • Mechanical Breakdown - NOT USED • Missing or Lost – NOT USED • Theft– NOT USED

authorizationCode.description: The claim authorization that would serve as the traded in device for the JUMP transaction

deductibleAmount.description: The deductible that is due on this claim submission

programType.description: It refers to the program type of the claim. values are DRP, JUMP

claimNumber.description: The unique identifier for a created claim

numberOfClaims.description: Number of insurance claims made in last 12 months.

acceptedAmount.description: The amount that will be paid for the device being traded in. This should be the EIP balance from  the Offer or the Device Recovery amount from the Offer.

deviceLevelBalance.description: Balance on the EIP agreement at the time of the JUMP upgrade

eipPlanId.description: EIP unique Identifier for the EIP agreement

installmentEquipmentId.description: Unique ID assigned to each installment equipment in EIP.

damagedDeviceCollected.description: set to true if damaged device is collected

claimCollectedUpfront.description: Set to true when the claim amount is collected upfront

RMANumber.description: Return Merchandise Authorization number associated with the claim

numOfRedemptionsLeft.description: total number of redemptions left in the line

RMAExpirationDate.description: Last date for the customer to ship RMA to the Vendo

deductibleSKU.description: SKU associated with the claim deductible amount

residualValue.description: Value of the leased property at the end of the lease term

items.description: Contains Fee details and damage type of the damaged devices

autoSelected.description: Defines whether the promotion is manually or automatically added to a cart/order

tradeInIntent.description: Describes the intent of the trade in Possible values PROMO STANDARD

excludeFairMarketValue.description: Decision for the EFPE (Enterprise Promotion Enrollment)system response for fair market value amount

recurringAmount.description: Monthly discount in dollars associated to a promotion

period.description: Tenure of the promo in months

totalAmount.description: TotalAmount of promo (Promo price *Tenure of the promo in months)

usage.description: how this attribute can be used.

items.description: Properties that decribes how the item should be displayed in the UI

addressFormatType.description: A code specifying the format of this address(STREET_ADDRESS, POBOX_ADDRESS,MILITARY_ADDRESS,FOREIGN_ADDRESS,HWY_ADDRESS,RURALROUTE_ADDRESS)

addressType.description: A code specifying the type of this address(BILLING,E911,USER,MAILING,PPU)

addressLine1.description: The first free form line, expressed as text, of an address

addressLine2.description: The second free form line, expressed as text, of an address

addressLine3.description: The third free form line, expressed as text, of an address

addressLine4.description: The fourth free form line, expressed as text, of an address

building.description: A building name or number. An office park or campus may have several buildings that are distinguished by the building name or number.

area.description: Refers to an area of the building such as left wing, right wing etc.

cityName.description: The name, expressed as text, of the city, town or village of this address

stateName.description: Name of the state in which the city falls, where applicable

stateCode.description: Code of the state in which the city falls, where applicable(WA, TX, GA)

provinceName.description: Name of the province where the address is located, if applicable

provinceCode.description: Code of the province where the address is located, if applicable(OX,PQ)

ruralRoute.description: Rural Route Number for the address, if applicable

countryCode.description: The unique identifier of a country for this address (Reference ISO 3166 and UN/ECE Rec 3)

countryName.description: The name of a country for this address (Reference ISO 3166 and UN/ECE Rec 3)

countrySubDivisionID.description: An identification of a country sub-division of this address such as a department in France. To be used only if there is no named term that represents the countrysubdivision concept being expressed

citySubDivisionName.description: A name, expressed as text, of a sub-division of a city for this address, for example a district or borough. To be used only if there is no named term that represents the citysubdivision concept being expressed

attentionOf.description: The name, expressed as text, of a person or department in the organization to whom incoming mail is marked with words such as 'for the attention of' or 'FAO' or 'ATTN' for this address

careOf.description: he name, expressed as text, of a person or organization at this address to whom incoming mail is marked with words such as 'care of' or 'C/O'

postalCode.description: A code specifying the postalcode of the address

postalCodeExtension.description: An extension to the postalcode of the address, e.g., in 94070-3541, the extension is 3541.

geoCodeID.description: A unique code that represents a geospatial coordinate measurement of an exact geographic location and time at, below, or above the surface of the earth

uncertaintyIndicator.description: Uncertainty code for geo-code 'FULL'-Full Address, 'ZIP'-Rural Zip+4

inCityLimitIndicator.description: Indicates whether or not this address is within the taxing boundary of the jurisdiction that's provided in the address.

timeZoneCode.description: Code indicating the time zone of the address, e.g., EST, PST, UTC-8, UTC-5

countyCode.description: A numeric code identifying the county from the Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS)

taxAreaID.description: An unique ID that identifies the area of an address for tax purposes

startTime.description: Start DateTime of the Time Period

duration.description: Start DateTime of the Time Period

endTime.description: End Date Time of the Time Period

nameType.description: Type of name such as Legal name, official name and so on.

firstName.description: Persons given name or first name

maidenName.description: the family name that the married name replaces

items.description: title of the person. For example Dr, Senator, Mr..
Way the person is addressed e.g. Honorable etc

prefix.description: Prefix to the last name that is not considered part of the last name, such as German von or French dela, etc

suffix.description: Suffix to the last name, such as Senior, III, the Third etc

preferredName.description: Name by which the person prefers to be addressed

items.description: Alias by which the person is known

userMessage.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

id.description: specifies the line for which details need to be retrieved

items.description: specifies the category names for this active line e.g Device, Plan

ServiceIndicator.description: Uniquely identifies the type of Soc (3 character representation such as CLS, NEO, FPC, FPN, etc)

listLoadScore.description: Indicates AAL Upgrade score used to calculate List load eligibility

dualEIP.description: Indicator to identify 2 EIP plans for the device on the MSISDNs

MSISDN.description: Mobile Subscriber Integrated Services Digital Network Number. A number uniquely identifying a subscription in a GSM or a UMTS mobile network. Simply put, it is the telephone number to the SIM card in a mobile/cellular phone

productType.description: ProductType of the subscriber, G - GSM, B - MBB

SIM.description: Sim device number that is associated with this record.

jumpEligibilityReasonCode.description: Reason Code for the subscriber's eligibility/ineligibility

contractTerm.description: Rate Plan contract duration in months

breakContractInd.description: indicates if a rate plan change breaks the subscriber’s existing contract or not

currentDeviceSKU.description: refers to the current device SKU for an existing customer.

currentPlanCode.description: Uniquely identifies a plan, option, or feature within a market for an existing customer

currentPlanType.description: refers to the current plan type of the customer

currentPlanLevel.description: the current rateplan level of the customer. Pooled or nonPooled

futurePlanType.description: the future plan type of the customer

futurePlanCode.description: Soc code of the rateplan which subscriber has migrated during the upgrade

futurePlanName.description: short description of the rateplan which subscriber has migrated during the upgrade

futurePlanDescription.description: description of the rateplan which subscriber has migrated during the upgrade

items.description: refers to the current feature code of the customer.

futureSocCode.description: This field indicates the New SOC code Selected

classicToValue.description: Represents the available criteria for classic to value, whether just the plan (primary or AAL) is eligible or the data soc is eligible or both.

migrationFee.description: refers to the fee to be paid when a subscriber switches from classic to value plan.

eligibleForEarlyUpgrade.description: Indicates if eligible for early upgrade.

activationFee.description: refers to the activation fee of the line

activationDate.description: refers to the date of activation of this line.

financeType.description: refers to the finance type of the device say LEASE or LOAN

totalDamageFee.description: refers to the total fee details of all the damaged devices

customerAccountType.description: applicable only for non-JUMP upgrades, should be set to for PREPAID for prepaid customers and POSTPAID for postpaid customers

recentActivationIndicator.description: Indicates whether the account includes recent Activations

quoteRejectionReason.description: Reason for rejecting the quote which will be used by OMS to call SetQuoteDisposition.UI has to send any valid reference data which they get from the service getQuoteRejectReasons

type.description: Defines the nature of the program for which the Customer may be categorized under a Tier. If the Customer has enrolled in a SCORE program, 'SCORE' is returned. If the Customer is active on JUMP!, SEGMENTED_JUMP is returned.

price.description: Contains the actual amount of reduction in price that may be offered for a Device of interest

tierValue.description: A non negative number that indicates the current Tier of a Customer. It can range anywhere from 1 to 6.

nextEligibleTierValue.description: Indicates the next upper Tier to which the Customer shall be promoted to

nextEligibleTierDate.description: Indicates a date by when the Customer shall be promoted to the next higher Tier.

percentage.description: discount percentage applied on the price

deviceTypeDisabled.description: Property used by Clients to enable/disable the CoverageSolutionDevices

csdEligible.description: Property to indicate CSD eligble or not

chargeDamageFee.description: Backend will return this flag to indicate Damage Fee to be charged to customer or not based on damage Waiver flag and damage Fee applicable

damageFeeApplicable.description: flag to apply Damage Fee or not based on Question/Answers provided during return

orderReturnDate.description: The date on which SAP drops the order to FW Return Center

nonReturnFeeChargeDate.description: The date on which the NRF will be charged

nonReturnFeeExpiryDate.description: The date on which the return expires

sku.description: The unique alphanumeric code associated with this product/item.

items.description: Available colors of the device. i.e white
Available memory sizes for this device.

tacCode.description: Customer existing Handset device TAC Code information.

items.description: The preferred language of communication in the specified usage context. ISO 639-1 Code (en-US,en-CA,en-GB)

websiteURI.description: URI or URL for the communication

emailAddress.description: URI in the case of email communication

emailFormat.description: ndicates that the communication is preferred in HTML format, Plain Text, Rich Tex

phoneType.description: Indicates the type of Phone Communication. Recognized "usageContext" values are found in

phoneNumber.description: The complete number without separation between country code, area code etc

countryCode.description: The country dialing code for a communication number

areaCode.description: The area dialing code for a communication number

localNumber.description: The communication number, not including country dialing or area dialing codes

phoneExtension.description: The extension of the associated communication number

accessCode.description: The text that permits access to the electronic network of the associated ommunication number such as telephone network, for example 9, *70.

items.description: Indicates what type of phone service is governed by this Communication. Example, SMS, MMS Recognized "usageContext" values are found in

lastUpdateDate.description: last update DateTime for the Status
